configurations.select_config: SELECT ck.CONFIG_KEY, ck.CONFIG_VALUE from CONFIGURATION_KEYS ck
configurations.update_config: UPDATE CONFIGURATION_KEYS s SET s.CONFIG_VALUE = q'[value]' WHERE s.CONFIG_KEY = 'key'

AppIO.payment_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'
AppIO.payment_status_old: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='002$iuv' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoDominio'
AppIO.position_subject: SELECT columns FROM POSITION_SERVICE ps RIGHT JOIN table_name ps2 ON ps.DEBTOR_ID = ps2.ID WHERE ps.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode' AND  ps.NOTICE_ID = '$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber'
AppIO.position_subject2: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.FULL_NAME = 'SPOname_$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.deny_list: SELECT d.columns FROM DENYLIST d, PSP p, CANALI c, PA p2 WHERE d.FK_PSP = p.OBJ_ID AND d.FK_CANALE = c.OBJ_ID AND d.FK_PA = p2.OBJ_ID AND p.ID_PSP = '$activateIOPayment.idPSP' AND c.ID_CANALE = '$activateIOPayment.idChannel' AND p2.ID_DOMINIO = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'
AppIO.pm_session: SELECT columns FROM PM_SESSION_DATA WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.pm_session_old: SELECT columns FROM PM_SESSION_DATA WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$sessionToken'
AppIO.token_validity: SELECT TOKEN_VALID_FROM, TOKEN_VALID_TO FROM POSITION_ACTIVATE WHERE CREDITOR_REFERENCE_ID  = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.creditorReferenceId' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.fiscalCodePA' AND PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.psp: SELECT columns FROM table_name where ID_PSP = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idPSP'
AppIO.payment_status_1: SELECT columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = $activateIOPayment.noticeNumber and s.PAYMENT_TOKEN= '$activateIOPaymentResponse.paymentToken'
AppIO.info_pagamento: SELECT columns FROM CD_INFO_PAGAMENTO WHERE ID_SESSIONE='$sessionToken'
AppIO.rpt_stati: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
AppIO.getPspCarte: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('CP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1) AND CARRELLO_CARTE='Y' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null AND FLAG_IO = 'Y' AND CODICE_ABI <> '07061'
AppIO.getPspCarte_poste: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('CP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1) AND CARRELLO_CARTE='Y' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null AND FLAG_IO = 'Y'
AppIO.DB_GEST_ANN_update1: UPDATE RPT SET UPDATED_TIMESTAMP = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND IDENT_DOMINIO = '$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoDominio'

AppIOold.cd_info_pagamento: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoUnivocoVersamento' AND s.IDENT_DOMINIO = '#creditor_institution_code#'

Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_stati_rpt: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_stati_rpt_pa1: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$pa1'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_stati_payment_token: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.ID_CARRELLO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoCarrello'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_stati_position_payment_statu: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoCarrello' and s.pa_fiscal_code= '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_iuv: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$IuV' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_iuv2: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$2IuV' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_update1: UPDATE STATI_RPT_SNAPSHOT SET UPDATED_TIMESTAMP = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND ID_DOMINIO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_update2: UPDATE STATI_RPT_SNAPSHOT SET UPDATED_TIMESTAMP = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND ID_DOMINIO = '$pa1'
Mod1Mb.DB_GEST_ANN_notice_number: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID = '$NOTICE_ID'

Mod1Mb.by_iuv_and_id_dominio: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' and s.ID_DOMINIO = '$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP

Mod1Mb.by_id_sessione: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.ID_SESSIONE = '$sessionToken'
Mod1Mb.by_position_subject: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN POSITION_SERVICE pp ON pp.DEBTOR_ID = s.ID  where pp.notice_id = '$noticeNumber' and pp.pa_fiscal_code= '$pa'
Mod1Mb.by_position_transfer: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s where s.NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' and s.pa_fiscal_code= '$pa' order by s.id asc
Mod1Mb.by_id_carrello: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_CARRELLO = '$idCarrello'
Mod1Mb.by_ccp: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE CCP = '$ccp'
Mod1Mb.by_notice_number_and_payment_token: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' AND s.PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$paymentToken'
Mod1Mb.by_notice_number_and_payment_token_order: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' AND s.PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$paymentToken' order by s.RECIPIENT_STATION_ID ASC
Mod1Mb.by_psp: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.ID_PSP = '$psp'
Mod1Mb.by_ccp_and_ident_dominio: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE CCP = '$idCarrello' and IDENT_DOMINIO = '$pa'
Mod1Mb.by_payment_token_and_pa_fiscal_code: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.PAYMENT_TOKEN = '$paymentToken' and s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$pa'

Mod1Mb.obj_id_dom1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_DOMINIO = '$1pa'
Mod1Mb.position_receipt_transfer: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN POSITION_TRANSFER pt ON pt.ID = s.FK_POSITION_TRANSFER WHERE pt.NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' AND pt.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$pa'

Mod1.esito: SELECT v.columns FROM table_name r JOIN RT_VERSAMENTI v ON v.FK_RT=r.ID WHERE r.IUV='$iuv' AND r.CCP= '$nodoInviaRPT.codiceContestoPagamento' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO='$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1.esito_2iuv: SELECT v.columns FROM table_name r JOIN RT_VERSAMENTI v ON v.FK_RT=r.ID WHERE r.IUV=('$IUV','$IUV2') AND r.CCP= '$nodoInviaRPT.codiceContestoPagamento' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO='$nodoInviaRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1.esito_3iuv: SELECT v.columns FROM table_name r JOIN RT_VERSAMENTI v ON v.FK_RT=r.ID WHERE r.IUV in ('$IUV','$IUV2') AND r.CCP= '$ccp' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO='$pa'
Mod1.esito_4iuv: SELECT v.columns FROM table_name r JOIN RT_VERSAMENTI v ON v.FK_RT=r.ID WHERE r.IUV in ('$IUV','$IUV2') AND r.CCP in ('$ccp1','$ccp2') AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO='$pa'
Mod1.motivo_annullamento: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$sessionToken'
Mod1.motivo_annullamento_originale: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE_ORIGINALE = '$sessionToken'
Mod1.stati_RPT: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv' AND CCP= '$1ccp' AND ID_DOMINIO='$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.stati_RPT2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv2' AND CCP= '$2CCP' AND ID_DOMINIO='44444444445' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.stati_RPT_new: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv2' AND CCP= '$2CCP' AND ID_DOMINIO='$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.stati_RPT_noOrder: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv' AND CCP= '$1ccp' AND ID_DOMINIO='$pa'
Mod1.stati_RPT2_noOrder: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv2' AND CCP= '$2CCP' AND ID_DOMINIO='44444444445'
Mod1.retry_rpt: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE='$sessionToken' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.retry_rpt_original: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE_ORIGINALE='$sessionToken' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.Re: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE ='$idSessione' AND INSERTED_TIMESTAMP > ROUND(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY DATA_ORA_EVENTO
Mod1.Re_2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE ='$2idSessione' AND INSERTED_TIMESTAMP > ROUND(SYSDATE-1) ORDER BY DATA_ORA_EVENTO
Mod1.Retrieve_IdSession: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND CCP = '$ccp'
Mod1.Retrieve_IdSession2: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV = '$2iuv' AND CCP = '$2ccp'
Mod1.rpt_stati: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
Mod1.rpt_stati_pa: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' AND ID_DOMINIO = '$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
Mod1.rt_stati: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$IUV' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
Mod1.stati_carrello: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.ID_CARRELLO = '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoCarrello'
Mod1.position_payment: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' and s.pa_fiscal_code= '$pa' ORDER BY ID ASC
Mod1.payment_status: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.NOTICE_ID ='$activateIOPayment.noticeNumber' AND s.PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$activateIOPayment.fiscalCode'
Mod1.version: SELECT columns from table_name where ROWNUM = 1 AND VALID='Y' ORDER BY SNAPSHOT_VERSION desc
Mod1.getPspCarte: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('CP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CARRELLO_CARTE='Y' AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.getPspCarte_bollo: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND PSP_FLAG_BOLLO = 'Y' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('CP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CARRELLO_CARTE='Y' AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null

Mod1.getPspAltro: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND CANALE_APP = 'Y' AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.getPspAltro_bollo: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND CANALE_APP = 'Y' AND PSP_FLAG_BOLLO = 'Y' AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null

Mod1.getPspConto_noPoste_2: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('BBT','BP','AD','MYBK','OBEP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.getPspAltro_noPoste: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND CANALE_APP = 'Y' AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.getPsp_CONV1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = '$version' AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE= '$codiceConvenzione' AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('BBT','BP','AD','MYBK') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CODICE_LINGUA = '$lingua' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < '$importoTot' AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= '$importoTot' AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE = '$codiceConvenzione' UNION SELECT ID FROM table_name WHERE FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = '$version' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < '$importoTot' AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= '$importoTot'
Mod1.getPsp_FLAG_bollo: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND CANALE_APP = 'Y' AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND PSP_FLAG_BOLLO = 'Y' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.getPsp: SELECT columns from table_name where FK_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = $version AND CANALE_APP = 'N' AND TIPO_VERS_COD in ('CP') AND CANALE_MOD_PAG in (0,1,2) AND CARRELLO_CARTE='Y' AND PSP_ID <> 'POSTE1' AND IMPORTO_MINIMO < $importoTot AND IMPORTO_MASSIMO >= $importoTot AND CODICE_CONVENZIONE is null
Mod1.chekPlugin: SELECT columns from table_name c join CANALI_NODO n on n.OBJ_ID=c.FK_CANALI_NODO where c.ID_CANALE='$canaleUsato'
Mod1.rt_versamenti: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN RT r on s.FK_RT=r.ID  WHERE r.IUV = '$iuv' AND r.CCP= '$ccp' AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO= '$nodoInviaCarrelloRPT.identificativoDominio'
Mod1.esito_4iuv_: SELECT v.columns FROM table_name r JOIN RT_VERSAMENTI v ON v.FK_RT=r.ID WHERE r.IUV in ('$IUV','$IUV2') AND r.CCP in ('$ccp1','$ccp2') AND r.IDENT_DOMINIO='$pa'
Mod1.codice_convenzione: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_CARRELLO = '$idCarrello'
Mod1.ID_Serv_Plugin: SELECT columns from table_name c join CANALI_NODO n on n.OBJ_ID=c.FK_CANALI_NODO where c.ID_CANALE='$canaleUsato'
Mod1.sblocco_parcheggio: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV='$iuv' AND CCP= '$ccp' AND ID_DOMINIO='$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
Mod1.codice_convenzione_session: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE ='$sessionExpected'
Mod1.checkPlugin: SELECT columns from table_name c join CANALI_NODO n on n.OBJ_ID=c.FK_CANALI_NODO where c.ID_CANALE='$canaleUsato'
Mod1.get_staz_inter_pa: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE ='$sessionExpected' AND INSERTED_TIMESTAMP > ROUND(SYSDATE-1)

RTPull.rpt_stati: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
RTPull.rpt_stati_IUV: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$IUV' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP ASC
RTPull.by_iuv: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv'
RTPull.by_iuv_and_ccp: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' AND s.ccp = '$ccp'
RTPull.getSchedulerPspRetryAckNegativePollerMax: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.CONFIG_KEY='scheduler.pspRetryAckNegativePollerMaxRetry'
RTPull.rpt_id1: SELECT columns FROM table_name  where IUV = '$iuv1' and ID_DOMINIO= '#creditor_institution_code_old#'
RTPull.rpt_id2: SELECT columns FROM table_name  where IUV = '$iuv2' and ID_DOMINIO= '#creditor_institution_code_old#'

faultBeanEsteso.by_iuv_ccp_pa: SELECT columns FROM table_name s WHERE s.IUV = '$iuv' AND s.CCP = '$ccp' AND s.ID_DOMINIO = '$pa' ORDER BY INSERTED_TIMESTAMP

costanti.get_broadcast: SELECT columns FROM PA p, table_name psp WHERE p.OBJ_ID = psp.FK_PA AND p.ID_DOMINIO = '$verifyPaymentNotice.fiscalCode' AND psp.SEGREGAZIONE = '#cod_segr#'
costanti.get_pa_id: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_DOMINIO = '$pa'
costanti.by_station_id: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_STAZIONE = '$station_id'

update_query.idempotency_update: UPDATE IDEMPOTENCY_CACHE SET VALID_TO = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE IDEMPOTENCY_KEY = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idempotencyKey' AND PSP_ID = '$sendPaymentOutcome.idPSP'
update_query.param_update: UPDATE table_name SET param = 'value' WHERE where_condition = 'valore'
update_query.param_update_in: UPDATE table_name SET param = 'value' WHERE where_condition IN valore
update_query.param_update_generic_where_condition: UPDATE table_name SET param WHERE where_condition
update_query.inserted_timestamp: UPDATE POSITION_PAYMENT_PLAN SET INSERTED_TIMESTAMP = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE NOTICE_ID = $1noticeNumber AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = $pa
update_query.updated_timestamp: UPDATE POSITION_PAYMENT_PLAN SET UPDATED_TIMESTAMP = TO_DATE('date', 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE NOTICE_ID = $1noticeNumber AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = $pa

RendicontazioneFTPeBollo.rendicontazione: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_FLUSSO = '$identificativoFlusso' AND DOMINIO = '$pa' ORDER BY ID DESC
RendicontazioneFTPeBollo.send_queue: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN RENDICONTAZIONE r ON s.ID = r.FK_SFTP_FILE WHERE r.ID_FLUSSO = '$identificativoFlusso' AND r.DOMINIO = '$pa'
RendicontazioneFTPeBollo.binary_file: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN RENDICONTAZIONE r ON s.ID = r.FK_BINARY_FILE WHERE r.ID_FLUSSO = '$identificativoFlusso' AND r.DOMINIO = '$pa'
RendicontazioneFTPeBollo.send_queue1: SELECT s.columns FROM table_name s JOIN RENDICONTAZIONE r ON s.ID = r.FK_SFTP_FILE WHERE r.ID_FLUSSO = '$identificativoFlusso'

Primitive_accessorie.rpt: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE IUV = '$iuv' AND CCP= '$ccp'
Primitive_accessorie.stati_rpt_snapshot: SELECT columns FROM table_name srs WHERE srs.STATO ='$status' AND srs.ID_DOMINIO ='$pa' ORDER BY srs.UPDATED_TIMESTAMP DESC

flussi_paralleli.idempotency_paymentToken: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID = '$noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$fiscalCode'
flussi_paralleli.payment_status: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID ='$noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$fiscalCode'
flussi_paralleli.payment_status_orderbydesc: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID ='$noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$fiscalCode' ORDER BY ID DESC
flussi_paralleli.payment_status_pay_act1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE NOTICE_ID ='$noticeNumber' AND PA_FISCAL_CODE = '$fiscalCode' AND PAYMENT_TOKEN ='$paymentToken'
flussi_paralleli.rt_v1: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE CCP= '$paymentToken' AND IDENT_DOMINIO= '$fiscalCode'

informative.cds_servizio: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE VERSIONE = 1

wfesp.parametri_profilo_pagamento: SELECT columns FROM table_name WHERE ID_SESSIONE = '$sessionToken'
